scripts.build: npm run ui:alias-check && npm run ui:deps-check && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.ui:deps-check: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; $p='src/ui/lovable/fee-confidence/**/*.ts*'; $m = Select-String -Path $p -Pattern '@radix-ui|class-variance-authority|tailwind-merge|\bcn\(|\bcva\(' -SimpleMatch:$false; if ($m) { Write-Host '❌ Disallowed UI deps detected in lovable UI'; $m | ForEach-Object { Write-Host $_.Path ':' $_.LineNumber ':' $_.Line }; exit 1 } else { Write-Host '✅ No disallowed UI deps in lovable UI' }"
scripts.ui:alias-check: powershell -Command "if (Get-ChildItem -Recurse src/ui/lovable/fee-confidence -Include *.ts,*.tsx | Select-String '@/') { Write-Host '❌ Alias imports found in lovable UI'; exit 1 } else { Write-Host '✅ No alias imports in lovable UI' }"
